Package com.petroldesigns.chatbot

Class Summary
PetrolBot  
PetrolBotConfig The PetrolBotConfig class is a singleton that loads and manages a bot configuration from an xml file specified on the command line (or in a default location)
PetrolBotPrefs The class consisting of boilerplate code used for storing the AOL preferences
